page.title: 07PATHHEAD:PRESENT DAY SHOPS
page.content: AT THE MOMENT IN PATHHEAD WHICH NOW HAS A POPULATION OF 900 THERE ARE ONLY 7 SHOPS. A BAKER, A GROCER AND WINE MERCHANT, A MINI SUPERMARKET, A NEWSAGENT, A GENERAL STORE PLUS POST OFFICE AND A FISH AND CHIP SHOP.THERE IS ONLY ONE PUBLIC HOUSE AND A HOTEL SITUATED JUST NORTH OF THE VILLAGE. THERE ARE NO LONGER ANY TRADESMEN RESIDENT IN THE VILLAGE. SEVERAL BUILDINGS WHICH WERE USED AS SHOPS HAVE NOW BEEN CONVERTED INTO HOUSES. MOST FAMILIES GO TO THE LARGE STORES IN DALKEITH OR VISIT THE LARGE SUPERSTORES IN EDINBURGH ONCE A MONTH TO STOCK UP WITH PROVISIONS. THE LOCAL SHOPS ARE NOW USED MOSTLY FOR PERISHABLE GOODS.
